title: David Byrne
text: Final Year Business Studies Student in DCU (Analytics Specialism), expected to graduate with first-class honours. I have a strong academic record, achieving 613 points in the Leaving Certificate and a 1.1 grade across the first and second years of the Business Studies curriculum. Gained invaluable experience in the Finance industry through a year-long internship with KKR & Co Inc.Â Complemented by certifications in SQL, Python, and financial modeling, I am poised to contribute effectively to an analytical role upon graduation in May 2025.

title: Quarto Test
text:
print("hello world")

hello world



import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

r = np.arange(0, 2, 0.01)
theta = 2 * np.pi * r
fig, ax = plt.subplots(
  subplot_kw = {'projection': 'polar'} 
)
ax.plot(theta, r)
ax.set_rticks([0.5, 1, 1.5, 2])
ax.grid(True)
plt.show()
